arStrings.szText: At {SF_2} stacks of Shadow Feast and Blood Feast, unleash a burst of Shadow damage.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging enemies with your {c_important}Blood{/c} or {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills has a up to a {c_number}[SF_6|%|]{/c} chance to grant a stack of Blood Feast or Shadow Feast respectively. (up to {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} stacks)

Gaining Blood Feast Heals for {c_number}[{SF_1}*100|1%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_1]){/c}. Gaining Shadow Feast increases your Shadow damage by {c_number}[SF_7 * 100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} seconds.

When you have {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} stacks of both, unleash a burst of Shadow damage that deals {c_number}{payload:PULSE}{/c} damage and Stuns enemies for {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} seconds.
At {SF_2} stacks of Shadow Feast and Blood Feast, unleash a burst of Shadow damage.
